Package service

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    HashCode
    HashCode class provides hashing for passwords
    StudyService
    StudyService class provides methods for dealing with Study objects, getting list of available topics, getting next Card object from some shuffled sequence and processing user's answers.
    StudyServicePrepareSequenceUnitTest
    StudyServicePrepareSequenceUnitTest class provides parameterized testing of StudyService protected prepareSequence() method with different dictionaries:
    - cards only with priority '1'
    - cards with priorities '1' and '2'
    - cards with priorities '1' and '3'
    - cards with priorities '1', '2' and '3'
    - cards with priorities '2' and '3'
    - cards only with priority '2'
    - cards only with priority '3'
    - cards with priority '1' with one card with priority '2'
    - cards with priority '1' with one card with priority '3'
    StudyServiceUnitTest
    StudyServiceUnitTest provides testing StudyService class.
    UserService
    UserService class provides methods for dealing with User and related History objects.
    UserServiceUnitTest
    UserServiceUnitTest provides testing UserService class.
